item.title: These six states banned or limited DEI at colleges and universities in 2024
item.description: Six states banned the practice of diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) in their educational institutions in 2024 alone.

item.title: Smugglers abandon two migrant girls at southern border with note to authorities
item.description: Smugglers left two young children to fend for themselves at the southern border, for them to be rescued shortly after by Texas troopers.

item.title: Jimmy Carter ‘killer rabbit attack’ story highlighted his struggles as president

item.title: US appeals court upholds Trump verdict in E. Jean Carroll defamation case

item.title: Germany accuses Elon Musk of trying to interfere in its national elections
item.description: Musk has billed the right-wing party AfD as the 'last spark of hope' for Germany—prompting outrage from U.S. and German officials.
